cells.data:
1. Install operator (defaults)
  2. Create project, e.g. argocd
  3. Create argoCD instance in project
  4. Get admin credentials:

oc get route argocd-server -n argocd --template='{{ .spec.host }}'
kubectl -n argocd get secret argocd-cluster-cluster -o 'go-template={{index .data "admin.password"}}' | base64 -d
# result is pw (w/o # at the end, if avail)
